meanings.definition: To cook by dry heat, as in an oven.
meanings.sent1: Mom bakes delicious cookies every Sunday.
meanings.sent2: She bakes a cake for birthdays.
meanings.sent3: The baker bakes so many treats, he must dream of cookies!
meanings.sent4: Her love for baking bakes joy into every dessert.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread bakes memories of childhood.

meanings.definition: To harden or dry by heat.
meanings.sent1: The sun bakes the clay pots in the yard.
meanings.sent2: The desert heat bakes the sand into hard dunes.
meanings.sent3: The hot oven bakes the paint on the car.
meanings.sent4: The intense heat bakes the earth, making it crack.
meanings.sent5: The fire bakes the clay into sturdy bricks.

meanings.sent1: The pie bakes in the oven for an hour.
meanings.sent2: The bread bakes until golden brown.
meanings.sent3: The cookies bake quickly, so keep an eye on them!
meanings.sent4: The pizza bakes in the wood-fired oven, filling the air with a tempting aroma.
meanings.sent5: The muffins bake perfectly, rising to a fluffy texture.
